info.name: Dayflow HRMS API (Complete)
info.description: A comprehensive API collection for Dayflow HRMS. Includes generic auth token handling and detailed examples for all roles.

variable.description: JWT Token for authentication (Auto-updated by Sign In)

request.description:
**Step 1: Sign In**
Use this request to log in. 
- **Employee**: Use valid employee credentials.
- **Admin**: Use valid admin credentials.

**Note**: The script in the 'Tests' tab automatically saves the received 'token' to the collection variables.
Register a new user account. Required fields: name, email, password.
Get details of the currently logged-in user using the Bearer token.
Initiate password reset flow.
Reset password using the token received via email. Replace :token in URL.
Get full profile details of the logged-in employee.
Update personal details. Note: You cannot update core job details here.
HR/Admin: List all employees with pagination.
Get list of all distinct departments.
HR/Admin: Get a specific employee's details.
HR/Admin: Update job details, role, etc.
Admin: Soft delete or remove an employee.
Employee: Mark daily attendance check-in.
Employee: Mark daily attendance check-out.
Employee: View own attendance records.
HR/Admin: View attendance for a specific date or range.
HR/Admin: Get aggregated attendance statistics.
HR/Admin: Manually correct or add attendance record.
Employee: Submit a new leave request.
Employee: View leave history and status.
Employee: Check remaining leave quota.
Employee: Cancel a pending leave request.
HR/Admin: details of all leave requests. Filter by status (Pending, Approved, Rejected).
HR/Admin: Approve a leave request.
HR/Admin: Reject a leave request with a reason.
Employee: View salary slips/history.
HR/Admin: View payrolls for a specific period.
Admin: Trigger batch payroll generation for all active employees for the specified month.
HR/Admin: Manually create or adjust a specific payroll record.
HR/Admin: Mark a payroll record as Paid.
Get summary stats for the employee home screen.
Get high-level company stats for the admin home screen.
Get recent system-wide activities.
